page.title: 04EVENTS NETT'M & MULSANNE
page.content: Nettleham is twinned with Mulsanne,a village just 5 miles south of Le Mans, famous for its motor racing circuit. The district of the Loire Valley,with its castles and wines makes a popular destination for Nettleham people to visit, either in organised parties, or to family links.Twinning began in 1978 and is flourishing.Visits alternate between the villages,50-60 French visit Nettleham alternate years,a dozen or more visit families whenever they like.A school party has visited the Junior School twice, staying in pupils homes. Frogs legs & snails are eaten there,pork pies, haslet and plum bread here.Mulsanne is larger,hotter&cheaper than Nettleham.They have a Sports Centre for various activities.
